title: CSI Games Ultra Pack- MARSDENTECH
description:
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
|MARSDENTECH Presents: CSI Games Ultra Pack|
 -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

Description
-=-=-=-=-=-=

A collection of all of the currently released CSI games- CSI, CSI- Dark Motives, CSI- Miami, CSI- 3 Dimensions Of Murder CSI- Hard Evidence and CSI- New York.

Additional Details
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Features:

CSI
-=-=

Play a Las Vegas scientific police rookie and investigate alongside the heroes of the TV show. Inspect the crime scenes, interrogate the suspects and collect and analayse the clues to discover the truth.

CSI- Dark Motives
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

Unfold new gruesome homicides. Piece together the evidence behind the crimes and collect clues with real-life forensic tools including fingerprint duster, UV light and more, to solve the puzzles.

CSI- Miami
-=-=-=-=-=-

Uncover the dark antics of Miami's beaches and night-clubs. Join the CSI: Miami cast and use their high-tech lab to find the truth and dissect the criminal mind.

CSI- 3 Dimensions Of Murder
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

You are a CSI intern assigned to the graveyard shift of the Las Vegas Crime Lab. To discover the truth behind the crimes, you must visit crime scenes, interview suspects, and collect and analyse physical evidence. Luckily, you have the help of Las Vegas's top CSI agents and support team.

CSI- Hard Evidence
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Las Vegas is full of secrets. As an experienced CSI agent, recently transferred to the LVPD's CSI unit, you'll need to uncover plenty of them. To discover the truth behind the city's homicides, you'll visit crime scenes and interrogate suspects, while collecting and analysing physical evidence. Along the way, you'll be working with Las Vegas' top CSI agents. When you're ready, Gil Grissom is expecting you in his office.

System Requirements:

CSI, CSI- Dark Motives & CSI- Miami
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP
Processor: Pentium III 600MHz/AMD Athlon 600MHz
Memory: 256MB RAM
3D Card: 16MB DirectX 9.0 Compatible
DirectX: DirectX 9.0 (included)
DVD-ROM Drive: 4X
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
Hard Disk: 650MB minimum for each game.

CSI- 3 Dimensions Of Murder
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

OS: Windows 98/ME/200/XP
Processor: 1GHz (only when Video card = hardware T&L)(2GHz Recommended(Require if Video card = No hardware T&L))
Memory: 256MB RAM (512MB Recommended)
Video Card: 64MB DirectX 8.1 compliant video card
Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 compliant sound device
DirectX: DirectX 8.1 or higher (8.1 included)
DVD-ROM: Any
Hard Drive: 1.4GB

CSI- Hard Evidence
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista
Processor: 2.0GHz or better (3GHz Pentium 4 or equivalent recommended)
Memory: 512MB (1GB Recommended)
Video Card: 64MB DirectX 8.0 compliant video card (128MB Recommended)
Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 sound device
DirectX: DirectX 8.1 (included)
CD-ROM: 4X
Hard Drive: 1.5GB minimum (2.3GB full)

CSI- New York
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista
Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz (1.2GHz Recommended)
Memory: 256MB RAM (512 MB for 2000/XP; 1 GB for Vista Recommended)
Video Card: 32MB DirectX 9.0c compliant
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compliant
DirectX: DirectX 9.0c
Flash Player: 9.0
Hard Disk: 500MB


Version:

#

Website: <a href="
http://csi.us.ubi.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://csi.us.ubi.com</a>

Price:

#

Installation Details
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Mount each of the images (*.iso and *.bin images) with Daemon Tools, install, and enjoy! And if a game will not start, activate SecuROM/ other disk emulator protection.

Activation Details
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
